audiomixer.channel.doc_request_description: Sets the channel positions on the UI
Get the channel visibility on the UI
Sets the channel visibility on the UI

If no `output` parameter is provided sets global input source volume.
            Otherwise sets volume of route from input channel to specified `output`.
audiomixer.channel.doc_response_description:
- Full output configuration if `output` param provided.
            - Otherwise?

audiomixer.outputs.doc_request_description: Returns current state of provided audio output
Removes audio output. Main audio output cannot be removed
Resets all audio output settings to its default state. For example ON and AFV flags.
Gets volume of audio output channel
Sets volume of audio output channel
Gets AFV flag for audio route from `source` to `output`.
Sets AFV flag for audio route from `source` to `output`.
Gets ON flag for audio route from `source` to `output`.
Sets ON flag for audio route from `source` to `output`.
Gets audio route from `source` to `output` to be post or pre fader
Sets audio route from `source` to `output` to be post or pre fader

multiviewer.doc_request_description: Returns a list of assets added to multiview

outputs.doc_request_description: Sets the main resolution of the project and frame rate.

producer.doc_request_description:
Deprecated. Instead use:
{
    "request-type": "audiomixer.channel.pfl.set",
    "message-id": "id-c8642a4b-6025-0283-bc3d-338b80fe0f40",
    "audioChannel": "PREVIEW",
    "on": true,
    "output": "PRODUCER"
}

to monitor preview or to monitor back program

{
    "request-type": "audiomixer.channel.pfl.set",
    "message-id": "id-c8642a4b-6025-0283-bc3d-338b80fe0f40",
    "audioChannel": "PREVIEW",
    "on": false,
    "output": "PRODUCER"
}

If other sources are monitored on PRODUCER then all need to be turned off to go back to only program audio.
This request only turns on or off layer mode.
This request only turns on or off scenes mode.
This request sets one of three possible values.

producer.pretty_name: Move input source to other layer
Add input with source onto a layer
producer.doc_request_example:
{
            "sourceName": "id-a5cbd5ae-b0dc-27b4-76cf-555fe47067c9",
            "layerName": "layer-d32efa82-94a1-3d24-4c8c-b3cbc979a57b",
            "sceneName": "Scene 2",
            "orderPosition": 0,
            "type": "liveStream",
            "displayName": "lambo",
            "additionalData": {},
            "sourceSettings": {
              "clear_on_media_end": true,
              "hwDecode": true,
              "input": "rtmp://test-streamer-s3dev.aws-dev.intranet/stream_test/lambo",
              "is_local_file": false,
              "looping": false,
              "restart_on_activate": false,
              "deinterlacing": "disable",
              "audioTrackIndex": 0
            },
            "item": {
              "visible": true
            },
            "request-type": "producer.layers.inputs.add",
            "message-id": "id-8c793004-ce13-3705-9556-0eb30501c117"
          }

requestParams.prettyName: Layer which source will be added on

requestParams.description: Index on a layer to place new input source

requestParams.prettyName: Source settings specific for this source type
TODO: Refactor to use item only.

producer.pretty_name: Duplicate source on the same layer
Set order of all layer items

requestParams.prettyName: Layer item id if source was added correctly.

{
            "request-type": "producer.layers.items.properties.set",

producer.doc_request_description: returns a list of sources used in the project along with their settings

Force action. If true play if false pause.

replays.doc_request_description: Returns a list of sources that can be added to replay

responseParams.prettyName: Object where properties names are ources types and values are arrays od sources objects

replays.pretty_name: Show original source on the output
replays.doc_request_description: Currently when switching output mode also all slots will be switched.
Currently when switching output mode also all slots will be switched.
Please read https://tellyo.atlassian.net/browse/TRD-5252 for information how this button should work.
This changes visible slot on output. In this case 'all' value for slot param does not make sense. So use only 0, 1, 2 or 3.
If there is already a source, it is automatically cleaned up. So remove source is not needed.

recording.doc_request_description: Creates a dedicated channel for recording a program
Returns information about currently ongoing recordings.

streaming.doc_request_description: Returns information about currently ongoing transmissions.

streaming.doc_response_description: Returns an object with additional settings for profiles

streaming.doc_request_description: Give a list of available streaming profiles
streaming.doc_response_description: Returns the state of the profile tree

streaming.pretty_name: Sets the data of streaming profiles
streaming.doc_request_description: Allows you to modify profile parameters. We can set data such as: profile is selected, profile output, audio tracks
streaming.doc_response_description: Returns the modified state of the profile tree

streaming.doc_request_description: Returns the title and description of the published video
Here you can set the title and description of the published stream
Go live with your chosen social media.
streaming.doc_response_description: Returns the state of the producer and a collection of currently initiated streams

streaming.doc_request_description: Gives basic information about the streaming status.
streaming.doc_response_description: The information returned is: it is active, can be start or stop streaming, start time and duration

streaming.doc_request_description: Stops the active or selected broadcast video stream

timer.pretty_name: Returns a list of defined timers.
Resets the state of the selected timer
